title: Day 1135
content:
# Day 1135

**Should You Have Children?**

Hard yes.

The world will give you a thousand reasons to wait.
Build your career. Stack more cash. Travel. Sleep in. "Find yourself."

That's all fine advice until it gets twisted into _don't have kids because they'll ruin all that_.
And that's where the lie creeps in.

But you?
A creature made in the image of The Lord!
You were not made to consume until you die.
You were made to _create_.

Let me ask you something:
When you're on your deathbed, who do you want in the room?
A pile of pay stubs? A few "super fans"? Your favorite podcast host?

Of course not. 
You want it to be the people who carry your face in theirs.
Your blood. Your fire. Your name.

And yeah having kids is hard.
It will challenge you in ways you did not imagine.
But if it doesn't challenge you, then it wasn't worth doing.

So ask yourself this and be honest with the answer:
Do you want people who will hold your hand when you're fading,
 and remember how you lived when you're gone?

Because if that's the end you want, start building it now.
Don't wait for the "perfect time."
It never shows up.

None of your ancestors died a virgin.
And you shouldn't either.

Find someone you love.
And bring life into the world.

It will break you open in the best way.

And it will give more meaning to your life
than anything you'll ever buy, build, or binge.

No one regrets the love they gave.
Only the time they didn't.
